channel.title: lisa on Hello Friend
channel.description: Recent content in lisa on Hello Friend

item.title: Princess Tea Party
item.description: Last Saturday, my Grandma threw me and my friends a Princess Tea Party. My friend Zoee and her sisters showed up, all dressed as princesses. My sister Sarah and I were dressed up like princesses, too, of course. It was lot’s of fun. Here are some photos of it.

item.title: A New Camera
item.description: I love taking pictures, so Mommy and Daddy decided to surprise me with my very own camera for Christmas. It’s a Kodak EasyShare C813 in case you’re interested. Here are just a few of the photos I’ve already taken with it.
